none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 19, 2012 Description from Terminal Escape:
Kevin sent me a copy months ago and I've been jamming ZEITGEIST regularly ever since. Equal parts THE GITS, LA FRACTION (obviously and especially in Tilley's vocals) and THIS IS MY FIST but with undeniable political USHC roots, this demo is just a taste of what their new LP has to offer. I listened to the LP a couple of times tonight and realized I hadn't gotten around to sharing the demo...I'm pretty slow sometimes. The demo is great, and the record rules. I suggest treating yourself to both. ZEITGEIST Every road I take seems to lead uphill // I'll find a moment's peace within the next cheap thrill
//1.bp.blogspot.com/--AKogrw78Vk/UAeSsI8k6jI/AAAAAAAADNQ/INMA6IRnGMM/s1600/zeitgeist++copy.jpg

seo.title: Zeitgeist - Zeitgeist demo 2011 - Terminal Escape
